name: farm run (fitted to macs)
description:
(exactly what it says on the tin baby

small browser version HERE)

an endless runner made in 2d game design , using a pre-made template and custom assets + slight changes

you are pig. use the arrows to hang out with your friends, cow, sheep, and dog

and avoid your enemies, the wolves

all art is by me

menu music

in game music additional sounds are from freesound.org
